title: Happy Diwali
content:
Happy Diwali

Happy Diwali Greetings

Wishing all my dear friends and readers of Sailu's Kitchen, celebrating the festival of lights, a very happy and safe Diwali. May the divine light illuminate your life and give you peace, prosperity, happiness and good health! 

Eggless Cupcakes with Chocolate frosting and Diwali Fondant (Sugarcrafted) Toppers

These sugar paste toppers have been inspired by fellow food blogger Madhuri's diwali cupcakes collection. You can look forward to the Eggless Cupcake recipe tomorrow. :)
